name: I Will ERASE Your Name
description:
Scorching desert, poisoned air, gunshots and gunshots again...

Even the dead are risen from their graves to stop us from doing more sins.

Is this is "The End of Time" everyone was talking about?

_______________

Alternative World where 1929 Economic Crisis engaged "The Great Colonial Clash"

in Middle East and Africa awaits You! Will you able to survive or the violent

whirlwind of madness WILL ERASE YOUR NAME?

_______________

Credits:

The Game Creators Team - FPSC Engine Programming

Alexander Arquestierre - game concept, level design

DeKare - music

This game uses sound recordings of unknown origin from 1920s

Any copyrighted materials belongs to their respective owners. This game is

completely FREE and can't be sold at any price! This is just a result of some 

spare time and a little imagination.
